metadata.title: CVE-2022-40208 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Moodle, insufficient limitations in some quiz web services made itpossible for students to bypass sequential navigation during a quizattempt.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
